= Check-list about the joint HIRLAM/HARMONIE monitoring interface =

HIRLAM programme maintains a [wiki:dataportal monitoring data portal] in which monitoring information from operational/real-time HARMONIE and HIRLAM suites from HIRLAM communities are regularly updated and inter-compared.

It is required that each on-duty staff, during his/her shift, to spend some time each day to go through at least SOME items of the model inter-comparison interface, and report findings about missing links or abnormal features. Feel free to limit your time spent on such inspection to be within one hour.

 1. Examine the present monitoring interface
   * Forecast charting interface, which is updated daily, and report MAJOR data holes on [http://www.hirlam.org/index.php?option=com_kunena&Itemid=160&func=view&catid=6&id=82 Monitoring forum] and inform Kalle (kalle.eerola@fmi.fi). Note that data from different models/centers may have a delay of one to two days.
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/Charts/CHARTS/1_RCR_area/index.html?choice_ind=Surface Latest HIRLAM forecast charts]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/Charts/AROME_WebgraF/index.html Latest HARMONIE forecast charts ]
   * Verification inter-comparison, which is updated daily, and report data holes on [http://www.hirlam.org/index.php?option=com_kunena&Itemid=160&func=view&catid=6&id=82 Monitoring forum] and inform Xiaohua (xiaohua@dmi.dk). 
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/InterComp Multi-model inter-comparison for operational HIRLAM system and for the trunk version of HIRLAM ]
     * Comparison interface centered about '''one or two''' institute/models '''. Please focus on most relevant models or features for your institute or your main expertise''', such as [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/HAAA/ HARMONIE system], [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/AEMET AEMET-HIRLAM], [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/DMI DMI-HIRLAM],  [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/EMHI EMHI-HIRLAM],  [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/FMI FMI-HIRLAM],  [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/KNMI KNMI-HIRLAM], [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/LHMS LHMS-HIRLAM], [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/METIE METIE-HIRLAM],  [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/METNO METNO-HIRLAM], [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsVer/SMHI SMHI-HIRLAM]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/glameps/WebgraF/ObsVer/Realtime Verification and intercomparison around GLAMEPS control runs].
   * Monitoring about operational suites at member services, , and report data holes or abnormal features on [http://www.hirlam.org/index.php?option=com_kunena&Itemid=160&func=view&catid=6&id=82 Monitoring forum]. Inform Xiaohua (xiaohua@dmi.dk)
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsUse HIRLAM Observation data coverage maps]. Report data holes. See also [wiki:HirlamInventory/Operational#Assimilatedobservationpseudoobservationinupperairanalysis listings ] about observation types expected to be used by different models.
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsUse/?choice_ind=HARMONIE_obstat HARMONIE observation data coverage maps]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsUse/?choice_ind=HARMONIE_obs_ts HARMOINE observation data usage time series]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/ObsUse/?choice_ind=HARMONIE_satarea HARMOINE observation data usage, satellite data]
     * [https://hirlam.org/portal/oprint/WebgraF/Logplot HIRLAM and HARMONIE Forecast diagnosis and analysis minimisation]
 1. Report and comment about any interesting or abnormal features that you observe. In particular, make a note on the [http://www.hirlam.org/index.php?option=com_kunena&Itemid=161 HIRLAM-forum] on [http://www.hirlam.org/index.php?option=com_kunena&Itemid=160&func=showcat&catid=6 operational monitoring at hirlam.org]. Typical examples:
   * some models failed to appear in the relevant interface for several cycles. (Note that data from various model may be delayed by one to two days).
   * some models display abnormal features
     * a dramatic or sudden departure of verification behavior, e.g., those commented in [http://www.hirlam.org/index.php?option=com_kunena&Itemid=160&func=view&catid=8&id=30 a forum post about t2m behaviour]
     * A complete miss of data at main synop hour for synop (00, 06, 12, 18) and TEMP (00, 12)
     * an abnormal cost function behavior in minimisation
     * an abnormal change of moisture spin-up feature
